review: I would highly recommended Dr Gayatri Karthik, I was having lot of periods related issues with abnormal bleeding patterns , I consulted many doctors earlier  but none was not able to diagnose the problem correctly and raised any alarm, with her help and expertise the root cause of my problem (malignant tumor) was identified correctly.

My wife had gynaecology related issues so went to hospital. ****** *** **** **** ** ********** **** Doctor was very friendly. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. There was waiting time in the hospital. It was for 20- 25 minutes. Medicines was prescribed by doctor during consultation. Sonography was done. Staff were very cooperative.

I had visited the hospital and it was gynaecology related. Doctor was good in consulting me. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family and friends. There was more waiting time when we went, that was concern. It was for one hour. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Medical tests were done in the hospital. Doctor was friendly.

This is a very experienced doctor but she is almost always in the OT and be prepared to wait anywhere from 1-3 hours in the hope she will come back and attend to her patients with “appointments”.  In the instance she is available, she is rushed and will rush you and barely listens to your side of the story so I never  felt comfortable and heard by her at all. The repeated lack of respect for people’s time has put me off and I will never be seeing her again. So if you value your time and need someone who is calm and can give you atleast 10 minutes of attention I would find someone else.

I had visited the hospital and it was gynaecology related . Consultation went well. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people.   There was waiting time when we went. It was for one hour. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Medical tests were done in the hospital.

My wife had been to hospital and it was for health issue. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. She was on medication. Doctor was friendly and Hospitality was good.

The consultation was for myself it was a pregnancy related consultation I am totally satisfied by her treatment she is very friendly & understandable takes total time to understand whatever is happening I would surely recommend the doctor

My wife had consulted the doctor and it was for gynaecology related. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I can surely recommend doctor to my family or friends circle. I accompanied her. She is taking medicines. Doctor is friendly. Staff were very cooperative.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *********** ******* ** *** **** ************* ***** She is very patient and listens to us before addressing our issues. Very friendly and prescribes the best medicine/ solution. Avoids medication as much as possible.
